content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Area (Position x=0-2, y=0)
Consists of two stone furnaces working in parallel:
- Stone furnace at (0,0) processing iron ore into plates
- Stone furnace at (2,0) processing iron ore into plates
Both furnaces are fueled with coal and actively working

### Copper Plate Production Area (Position x=4, y=4)
Single stone furnace processing copper ore into copper plates, fueled with coal and actively working

### Electronic Circuit Assembly Line (Position x=6.5-12.5, y=11.5)
Production line consisting of:
- Input wooden chest at (6.5, 11.5)
- Burner inserter at (7.5, 11.5) moving items from input chest to assembler
- Assembling machine 1 at (9.5, 11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at (11.5, 11.5) moving finished products
- Output wooden chest at (12.5, 11.5) storing finished electronic circuits

### Power Generation System (Position x=-9.5 to -2.5, y=22.5-26.5)
Complete power generation setup:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5) extracting water
- Pipe network connecting pump to boiler
- Boiler at (-7.0, 24.5) converting water to steam
- Steam pipe network
- Steam engine at (-2.5, 24.5) generating electricity
- Electric pole network distributing power

### Science Pack Storage and Research (Position x=0.5, y=28.5-31.5)
Research setup consisting of:
- Lab at (0.5, 28.5)
- Burner inserter at (0.5, 30.5) feeding science packs
- Storage chest at (0.5, 31.5) containing automation and logistic science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Technology Research Errors
- Ensure all prerequisite technologies are researched before attempting advanced research:
  - Oil processing requires fluid handling
  - Fluid handling requires engine technology
  - Solar energy requires optics
  - Advanced electronics requires plastics
  - Battery technology requires sulfur processing
  - Sulfur processing requires oil processing

### Invalid Technology Names
- Use correct technology enum names:
  - "Engine" and "Optics" are invalid - check correct enum values

### Resource Management
- Check fuel levels before attempting to insert fuel
- Ensure required ingredients are available before crafting (electronic circuits missing iron plates and copper cables)

### Already Researched Technologies
- Avoid attempting to research already completed technologies:
  - Automation 2
  - Steel processing
  - Electronics
  - Advanced material processing
  - Military
  - Electric energy distribution 1
